genomic data extracted: basic set of genomic data = promoter (Promoter), proximal promoter (ProximalPromoter), 5' untranslated region (X5UTR), coding sequence (CDS), intron (Intron), 3' untranslated region (X3UTR), downstream region (Downstream), distance to closest TSS (DistToClosestTSS), distance to closest TTS (DistToClosestTTS), DNA sequence conservation (phastcons),  DNAseI hypersensitivity (DHS) + Conserved non-coding element (CNS), Digital genomic footprinting (DGF), Chromatin state, Cytosine methylation (Cme), Histone 2A.Z positioning (H2AZ), DNA looping (Dloop), Nucleosomes positioning (Nuc), Histone2B monoubiquitination (H2BuB), Monomethylation on lysine 4 of the histone 3 (H3K4me1), Dimethylation on lysine 4 of the histone 3 (H3K4me2), Trimethylation on lysine 4 of the histone 4 (H3K4me3), Dimethylation on lysine 9 of the histone 3 (H3K9me2), Monomethylation on lysine 27 of the histone 3 (H3K27me1), Trimethylation on lysine 27 of the histone 3 (H3K27me3), Trimethylation on lysine 36 of the histone 4 (H3K36me3), Acetylation on lysine 9 of histone 3 (H3K9ac), Acetylation on lysine 14 of histone 3 (H3K14ac), Acetylation on lysine 18 of histone 3 (H3K18ac), Acetylation on lysine 27 of histone 3 (H3K27ac), Acetylation on lysine 56 of histone 3 (H3K56ac), Phosphorylation on tyrosine 3 of histone 3 (H3T3ph), Acetylation on lysine 5 of histone 4 (H4K5ac), Acetylation on lysine 8 of histone 4 (H4K8ac), Acetylation on lysine 12 of histone 4 (H4K12ac), Acetylation on lysine 16 of histone 4 (H4K16ac)

training condition: flowers basic set of genomic data + Digital genomic footprinting (DGF), Cytosine methylation (Cme)
